channel.title: Cant figure out why soem people get this when they try to run client
channel.description:
[table] [tr] [td]The system cannot find the path specified. PrimePK is loading.. java.lang.NegativeArraySizeException at client.drawLogo(client.java:3713) at client.startUp(client.java:8517) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:5759) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Error: loaderror Starting up 20 [/td] [/tr] [/table]
anyone know how i could fix?

item.title: Cant figure out why soem people get this when they try to run client

item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

make the background so it fits 770 X 503

item.title: Cant figure out why soem people get this when they try to run client
item.dc:creator: @purestmage74 purestmage74
item.description:
@purestmage74 wrote:

[quote=“2 drag claws, post:1, topic:423894”][quote][table]
[tr]
[td]The system cannot find the path specified.
PrimePK is loading…
java.lang.NegativeArraySizeException
at client.drawLogo(client.java:3713)
at client.startUp(client.java:8517)
at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33)
at client.run(client.java:5759)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
Error: loaderror Starting up 20
[/td]
[/tr]
[/table][/quote]

anyone know how i could fix?[/quote]

By the looks of that, it’s not locating the logo correctly, could be cache packed, or could simply just be a sprite, png, jpg, etc.

Or it’s not locating your java directory, but i doubt it would go to the next step.

Read full topic
